name: Hiling Sa Bituin
description:
This artwork might seem a bit dark in terms of meaning but it's inspired from a song I made a year ago. I know it's not exactly as festive as usual Christmas themes, but lately when I think about Christmas all that pops up in my head is how everything seems to be moving so fast and how I want it to all slow down even for just a bit. How I've grown old and numb to even feel the festivity in the air because I've been jaded by bad experiences. I know a lot of people may be able to relate, but growing old just really sucks sometimes.

If I could, I would have forever covered the eyes of my innocent self so that I wouldn't be exposed to the pains of this world that has now blinded me.

The title is translated to mean "A wish upon a star" because I remember thinking of shooting stars and comparing them to the star on top of a Christmas tree and wondering if I could wish upon it to relieve me of my pain.
